00020 #ifndef TLM_CORE_TLM_TARGET_SOCKET_H_INCLUDED_
00021 #define TLM_CORE_TLM_TARGET_SOCKET_H_INCLUDED_

00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_2/tlm_sockets/tlm_base_socket_if.h"
00024 #include "tlm_core/tlm_2/tlm_2_interfaces/tlm_fw_bw_ifs.h"

00027 namespace tlm {
00028 
00029 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00030           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_transport_if<>,
00031           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_transport_if<> >
00032 class tlm_base_target_socket_b
00033 {
00034 public:
00035   virtual ~tlm_base_target_socket_b() {}
00036 
00037   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<BW_IF> & get_base_port() = 0;
00038   virtual sc_core::sc_export<FW_IF> & get_base_export() = 0;
00039   virtual                    FW_IF  & get_base_interface() = 0;
00040 };
00041 
00042 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00043           typename FW_IF,
00044           typename BW_IF> class tlm_base_initiator_socket_b;
00045 
00046 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00047           typename FW_IF,
00048           typename BW_IF,
00049           int N,
00050           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> class tlm_base_initiator_socket;
00051 
00052 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00053           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_transport_if<>,
00054           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_transport_if<>,
00055           int N = 1,
00056           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00057 class tlm_base_target_socket : public tlm_base_socket_if,
00058                                public tlm_base_target_socket_b<BUSWIDTH, FW_IF, BW_IF>,
00059                                public sc_core::sc_export<FW_IF>
00060 {
00061 public:
00062   typedef FW_IF fw_interface_type;
00063   typedef BW_IF bw_interface_type;
00064   typedef sc_core::sc_port<bw_interface_type, N , POL> port_type;
00065 
00066   typedef sc_core::sc_export<fw_interface_type> export_type;
00067   typedef tlm_base_initiator_socket_b<BUSWIDTH,
00068                                       fw_interface_type,
00069                                       bw_interface_type>  base_initiator_socket_type;
00070 
00071   typedef tlm_base_target_socket_b<BUSWIDTH,
00072                                    fw_interface_type,
00073                                    bw_interface_type> base_type;
00074 
00075   template <unsigned int, typename, typename, int, sc_core::sc_port_policy>
00076   friend class tlm_base_initiator_socket;
00077 
00078 public:
00079   tlm_base_target_socket()
00080   : export_type(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_base_target_socket"))
00081   , m_port(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_base_target_socket_port"))
00082   {
00083   }
00084 
00085   explicit tlm_base_target_socket(const char* name)
00086   : export_type(name)
00087   , m_port(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name((std::string(name) + "_port").c_str()))
00088   {
00089   }
00090 
00091   virtual const char* kind() const
00092   {
00093     return "tlm_base_target_socket";
00094   }
00095 
00096   //
00097   // Bind target socket to initiator socket
00098   // - Binds the port of the initiator socket to the export of the target
00099   //   socket
00100   // - Binds the port of the target socket to the export of the initiator
00101   //   socket
00102   //
00103   virtual void bind(base_initiator_socket_type& s)
00104   {
00105     // initiator.port -> target.export
00106     (s.get_base_port())(get_base_interface());
00107     // target.port -> initiator.export
00108     get_base_port()(s.get_base_interface());
00109   }
00110 
00111   void operator() (base_initiator_socket_type& s)
00112   {
00113     bind(s);
00114   }
00115 
00116   //
00117   // Bind target socket to target socket (hierarchical bind)
00118   // - Binds both the export and the port
00119   //
00120   virtual void bind(base_type& s)
00121   {
00122     // export
00123     (get_base_export())(s.get_base_export());
00124     // port
00125     (s.get_base_port())(get_base_port());
00126   }
00127 
00128   void operator() (base_type& s)
00129   {
00130     bind(s);
00131   }
00132 
00133   //
00134   // Bind interface to socket
00135   // - Binds the interface to the export
00136   //
00137   virtual void bind(fw_interface_type& ifs)
00138   {
00139     export_type* exp = &get_base_export();
00140     if( this == exp ) {
00141       export_type::bind( ifs ); // non-virtual function call
00142     } else {
00143       exp->bind( ifs );
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00147   void operator() (fw_interface_type& s)
00148   {
00149     bind(s);
00150   }
00151 
00152   //
00153   // Forward to 'size()' of port class
00154   //
00155   int size() const
00156   {
00157     return m_port.size();
00158   }
00159 
00160   //
00161   // Forward to 'operator->()' of port class
00162   //
00163   bw_interface_type* operator->()
00164   {
00165     return m_port.operator->();
00166   }
00167 
00168   //
00169   // Forward to 'operator[]()' of port class
00170   //
00171   bw_interface_type* operator[](int i)
00172   {
00173     return m_port.operator[](i);
00174   }
00175 
00176   // Implementation of tlm_base_socket_if functions
00177   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base &         get_port_base()
00178     { return m_port; }
00179   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base const &   get_port_base() const
00180     { return m_port; }
00181   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base &       get_export_base()
00182     { return *this; }
00183   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base const & get_export_base() const
00184     { return *this; }
00185   virtual unsigned int                    get_bus_width() const
00186     { return BUSWIDTH; }
00187   virtual tlm_socket_category             get_socket_category() const
00188     { return TLM_TARGET_SOCKET; }
00189 
00190   // Implementation of tlm_base_target_socket_b functions
00191   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<BW_IF> &       get_base_port()
00192     { return m_port; }
00193   virtual sc_core::sc_port_b<BW_IF> const & get_base_port() const
00194     { return m_port; }
00195 
00196   virtual                    FW_IF  &       get_base_interface()
00197     { return *this; }
00198   virtual                    FW_IF  const & get_base_interface() const
00199     { return *this; }
00200 
00201   virtual sc_core::sc_export<FW_IF> &       get_base_export()
00202     { return *this; }
00203   virtual sc_core::sc_export<FW_IF> const & get_base_export() const
00204     { return *this; }
00205 
00206 protected:
00207   port_type m_port;
00208 };
00209 
00210 
00211 //
00212 // Convenience blocking and non-blocking socket classes
00213 //
00214 
00215 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00216           typename TYPES = tlm_base_protocol_types,
00217           int N = 1,
00218           sc_core::sc_port_policy POL = sc_core::SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00219 class tlm_target_socket :
00220   public tlm_base_target_socket <BUSWIDTH,
00221                             tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00222                             tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00223                             N, POL>
00224 {
00225 public:
00226   tlm_target_socket() :
00227     tlm_base_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00228                       tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00229                       tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00230                       N, POL>()
00231   {
00232   }
00233 
00234   explicit tlm_target_socket(const char* name) :
00235     tlm_base_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00236                       tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00237                       tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00238                       N, POL>(name)
00239   {
00240   }
00241 
00242   virtual const char* kind() const
00243   {
00244     return "tlm_target_socket";
00245   }
00246 
00247   virtual sc_core::sc_type_index get_protocol_types() const
00248   {
00249     return typeid(TYPES);
00250   }
00251 };
00252 
00253 } // namespace tlm
